globalAttributes.name: data-tooltip
globalAttributes.description: The content for the tooltip to display

globalAttributes.description: The direction that the tooltip renders in, in relation to the element that has the tooltip

values.description: Put the tooltip above the element

values.name: LEFT

values.name: DOWN
